column4: hello.. i realy need some assistance here... i canot connect to my smtp server
checked the iptables and it has access to the remote computer
it is running masqmail
!masqmail
hk299: nano
hello.. i need help with smtp pleaseeee
anyways... who can assist me with the smtp?
i can connect locally but cannot do it remotely
checked the iptables and everything is fine
the remote computer has access to it
poke a hole in your fw
but it is on the same network
so?
called my isp and they were not blocking it
do you use a router? i'd double check that one as well
yup.. and the router is set to accept all connections to that machine
try telnet'ing to that machine
on that particular port
maybe something could be happening there... checked the inetd.conf and it has some lines about sendmail and exim and i have masqmail
no idea
yup it says it cannot connect to it... when i restart the daemon, it says something about several smtps... but they are removed... apt-get removed them before
